name: DEXRAZOXANE
cautions:
Cautions 
(From Anthracycline side-effects: British National Formulary)
Anthracycline side-effects; monitor full blood count
doses:
prevention of anthracycline-induced cardiotoxicity, adult over 18 years, by intravenous infusion (30 minutes before anthracycline administration), 10 times the doxorubicin-equivalent
dose or 10 times the epirubicin-equivalent dose
pregnancy:
Pregnancy avoid unless essential (toxicity in animal studies); ensure effective contraception during and for at least
3 months after treatment in men and women
